ModuleDescription:
This module is intended for an individual or small group of students –
ordinarily 1-2 students– who would like to work with texts and other
materials in a language other than English. Students should clearly
articulate the goals of their project and what they aim to achieve by
the end of the semester. ILSR projects should go beyond reading the
assigned materials from another course in their original language.
Prerequisite:
Project proposal with consent of Faculty Supervisor, Language
Coordinator, Divisional Director, Vice Rector and Dean of Faculty.
